translations.404: You're looking for a page that never existed, no longer exists or our server is messing up on its own.
translations.Asetukset-kuvaus: You can make additional fields for questions, which will be asked of everyone who submits a new question. You can set additional fields mandatory, give them predefined, multiple-choice options and descriptive info texts. You can change the order of additional fields by changing the order of list below.
translations.Ei kirjautunut upotuksessa: This may be because you are using a browser that rejects 3rd party cookies. You can try changing your browser settings or using a different browser, e.g. Chrome.
translations.Ei oikeuksia: You don't have needed user rights
translations.Ei oikeuksia-näkymä: You either do not have the rights to this to see it, or the information you are looking for does not exist.
translations.Ei oikeutta kysymykseen: You do not have read access to this question.
translations.Ei osallistujana-otsikko: You are not a participant in this course.
translations.Ei osallistujana-viesti: You cannot ask or view personal questions asked in the course
translations.Ei yhtään UKK: No frequently asked questions have been added.
translations.Entä uusia ideoita, miten voisimme jatko: Or new ideas, how we could further develop this system? Or any other thoughts related to this system?
translations.Ei voi poistaa kysymystä: A question cannot be removed if there are comments on it
translations.Jatkamalla käyttöä: By continuing to use this site, you consent to the use of this information in the ticketing system.
translations.Jos et halua liittyä kurssille: If you don't want to join the course, you don't need to do anything.
translations.Jos kieltäydyt: If you opt out, your current account will be deleted and you will still be able to read FAQs without logging in.
translations.Jos olet kiinnostunut: If you are interested in how we handle your data, you can read
translations.Jos poistut: If you leave the view in the middle of editing, you will lose all your changes.
translations.Järjestelmän kuvaus: Tukki is a software project implemented by the Diginet -project to improve interaction between students and teachers in distance learning. The system allows students to send their problems and questions to teachers in the form of tickets, which the teachers can reply to. The system is ideal for courses with weekly assignments or other active activities for students who may have challenges or problems. However, it has been designed to be as versatile as possible to suit as many courses as possible.
translations.Järjestelmään tallennettu sähköpostiosoi: E-mail address saved in the system.
translations.Kaikkien liitetiedostojen poistaminen ei: Failed to remove all the selected attachments
translations.Kirjautumispalveluun ei saatu yhteyttä: The login service could not be reached
translations.Kommentin lisääminen epäonistui: Adding a comment to a question failed.
translations.Kommentin lisääminen: Adding a comment to a question was successful.
translations.Kurssialueen, jolla järjestelmä on käytö: The course area where the system is in use
translations.Kurssialuetta ei ole luotu: No course area has been created
translations.Kurssialuetta ei ole luotu-ohje: You have refused to provide information for the use of the ticketing system. The course area has not yet been created and therefore there is no content to display to the unregistered user. If you are a student, please contact your teacher to create a course area. If you wish, you can proceed to authorise the consent of data by clicking on the button below. In this case, a new course area will also be created.
translations.Kutsun tietojen haku epäonnistui: Could not find invitation details with the URL you entered. Check that URL is right. The invitation may also be expired.
translations.Kutsu ulkopuolisia kurssille: Invite people from outside the course
translations.Kutsumisohje: You can invite people from outside the course to take part in the course.
translations.Kysymysten lisäkenttien hakeminen epäonn: Failed to retrieve additional fields for questions
translations.Kysymyksen lisäämisestä ei vahvistusta: No confirmation of the success of adding the question was received.
translations.Muokatun kysymyksen lähettäminen onnistu: Sending an edited question was successful
translations.Käyttäjän kutsuminen epäonnistui: Sending an invitation to an external user failed
translations.Lähetä minulle sähköpostitse päivittäine: Send me daily summary about new questions and comments via e-mail
translations.Lähetä minulle sähköpostia tulleista kys: Send me notifications about new questions and comments via e-mail
translations.Lähetetään liitetiedostoja: Sending attachments, please wait a moment...
translations.Liittyäksesi kurssille: To join the course, log in as the user to whom the invitation has been sent
translations.Lisäkentän tietojen haku epäonnistui: Failed to retrieve additional field data
translations.Lisättiin usein kysytyt kysymykset tälle: Added frequently asked questions to this course
translations.Luo käyttäjätili kurssille: Create an account for the course
translations.Luotava tili on jo olemassa: The account you're trying to create already exists
translations.Minulle saa lähettää sähköpostia käyttäj: Send me requests to collect user feedback
translations.Ohjelmistosta: This is software produced by the Diginet project. Diginet is a project funded by the European Social Fund which is developed in cooperation between the University of Oulu and Oulu University of Applied Sciences.
translations.Olet kirjautunut käyttäjänä: You are currently logged in as a user:
translations.Onko sinulla ongelmia tämän järjestelmän: Do you have problems with this system?
translations.Paina enter valinnan kirjoittamisen jälk: Press enter after typing an option.
translations.Palautteen antaminen on täysin vapaaehto: Giving us feedback is completely voluntary. Thank you!
translations.Palvelimelta haettavaa tietoa ei löytyny: Retrievable information from server not found
translations.Poista tili ja jatka kirjautumatta: Remove account and continue without logging in
translations.Poistaa kaiken järjestelmään tallennetut: Deletes all your data stored in the system, including personal information, questions, comments, attachments and login information.
translations.Projektista: Diginet is a project funded by the European Social Fund to develop technical and pedagogical solutions for universities to improve distance learning. The project is carried out in cooperation with the University of Oulu and Oulu University of Applied Sciences.
translations.puuttuu kurssiID: No course ID was found. Check URL address spelling.
translations.Roolisi kurssilla: Your role in the course (teacher / student)
translations.Sinut on kutsuttu: You have been invited to join course
translations.Tallennamme seuraavat tiedot: We store the following information from Moodle in our database:
translations.Tekstikenttään lisäämäsi kuva on liian i: The image you added to the text field is too big. Attach a smaller image to the field or add the image as an attachment to the message.
translations.Tietojenkäyttösuostumus: This is the ticketing system built by the Diginet project for discussion and questions between teachers and students in the course. The software needs a personal account to allow you to submit and view personal questions. To do this, you need to know who you are, under which course you are on and what you are doing on the course.
translations.Tiedoston koko ylittää: Size of the file exceeds the 100 megabyte limit
translations.Tiedoston sisältö on virheellisessä muod: The contents of the file are in an incorrect format
translations.Tilin luomalla: By creating an account you provide authorise the transfer of this information for use by the ticketing system.
translations.Tilin luonti onnistui: A new user account was successfully created for this course
translations.UKK-lista ei saatu haettua: Could not retrieve the FAQs added for this course
translations.UKK lähettäminen onnistui: Sending a new frequently asked question was successful.
translations.UKK näyttäminen epäonnistui: Displaying a frequently asked question failed
translations.UKK poisto epäonnistui: Failed to remove frequently asked question
translations.UKK lisääminen epäonnistui: Failed to send a frequently asked question
translations.UKKden lisääminen epäonnistui: Failed to add frequently asked questions to this course
translations.UKK muokkaaminen epäonnistui: Failed to edit frequently asked question
translations.Uuden kysymyksen lähettäminen onnistui: Sending a new question was successful.
translations.Vahvista kommentin poistaminen: Confirm the removal of the comment
translations.Vaihtoehtojen merkkimäärä ylittyy: The total number of characters, including punctuation, exceeds the 255-character limit.
translations.Virkistä-viesti: Please refresh the browser view. This is done on the computer by clicking on the browser refresh icon or by pressing F5.
The connection to the server failed.
translations.Yhtään lisäkenttää ei ole lisätty: No additional fields have been added.
translations.Yleisen tietosuoja-asetuksen mukainen ti: Data acquisition request in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation. You can download all your own data.
